text: Ezɨ dughiar kamra, Abraham Godɨn akamɨn gɨn ghua, uan adarazir gumazibar mɨkarzir mogomebar iniba bar ada aghore. Egha uan otarim Ismaelɨn mɨkarzir mogomemɨn inim aghora, egha ingangarir gumazir kɨnir men amebaba Abrahamɨn dɨpenimɨn otezibar mɨkarzir mogomebar inibar aghora, egha ingangarir gumazir a igharaz darazi dam ivesezibar mɨkarzir mogomebar inibar aghore.
